name: The Wizard of Im
overview: In a remote corner of the galaxy, the planet Obid is is suddenly assailed by a meteor storm. As this ancient planet hurtles through the rocks, its greatest city, called Im, is threatened with annihilation. A city council is hastily assembled and a decision unanimously struck: Send for the Wizard of Im You are the Wizard of Im. Brandishing a magic wand that hurls huge fireballs, you set forth to destroy the deadly cascade of rock and spare the city. Despite your powers, however, it remains to be seen if you are quick enough to blast the multitude of menacing meteors before they fall to earth, The game is easy at first, but like a lot of shooters of this type, the falling meteors increase in speed as the game goes on. The Wizard of Im was developed by Bob Spirko and published as a type-in game in Ahoy! 1985/07 (Issue #19).
